name: r4nd0m1z3r
text: Just to let u know, I went 5-1 with this list: // Deck file for Magic Workstation (http://www.magicworkstation.com)// Lands 3 [UL] Ghitu Encampment 4 [LRW] Auntie's Hovel 4 [FUT] Graven Cairns 4 [IA] Sulfurous Springs 7 [UNH] Mountain 2 [TE] Reflecting Pool// Creatures 2 [SHM] Murderous Redcap 3 [FNM] Mogg Fanatic 4 [EVE] Figure of Destiny 4 [SHM] Tattermunge Maniac 3 [SC] Siege-Gang Commander// Spells 4 [MOR] Bitterblossom 4 [LRW] Tarfire 4 [10E] Incinerate 4 [SHM] Flame Javelin 4 [LRW] Thoughtseize// Sideboard SB: 4 [ALA] Infest SB: 4 [SHM] Guttural Response SB: 3 [SHM] Everlasting Torment SB: 4 [MR] Loxodon Warhammerhf))
